
```{r}
library(knitr)
load('data/BAM_redcap_long.RData')

BAM_redcap_long <- 
  BAM_redcap_long %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
  mutate(epsi_completers = sum(!is.na(epsi_neg_obese_complete))) 
         
BAM_redcap_long %>% 
  filter (epsi_completers == 3) %>% 
  group_by(group, timepoint) %>% 
  summarise(epsi_neg_obese = mean(epsi_neg_obese_25)) %>% 
  kable()

BAM_redcap_long %>% 
  filter (epsi_completers == 3) %>% 
  group_by(group, timepoint) %>% 
  summarise(GFFS = mean(gffs_sum_25)) %>% 
  kable()
```
